extendedIngredients.name: chocolate
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 boxes Jello Chocolate Mousse + milk to make according to package directions

recipes.title: Easy Double Chocolate Mousse Dessert
recipes.instructions: Mix mousse and bake brownies according to package directions. Allow brownies to cool and mousse to chill.Choose small dessert cups or parfait glasses.  Cut brownies to fit bottom of cup.  I used a drinking cup as a round cutter for the brownies.Spoon chilled mousse over brownie.Spread whipped cream over mousse.Dust the top with cocoa, if desired.  I used a small wire strainer to dust the cocoa.

steps.step: Mix mousse and bake brownies according to package directions. Allow brownies to cool and mousse to chill.Choose small dessert cups or parfait glasses.
Cut brownies to fit bottom of cup.  I used a drinking cup as a round cutter for the brownies.Spoon chilled mousse over brownie.
Spread whipped cream over mousse.Dust the top with cocoa, if desired.  I used a small wire strainer to dust the cocoa.
